results.title: To save her soul
results.brief_description: A moral tale of a choir singer and an enthusiastic admirer from the clergy who is intent on saving the young singer’s soul. Cast includes Mary Pickford, Arthur V. Johnson, Caroline Harris, Mack Sennett. Silent film with English intertitles.

results.title: To play the King
results.creator_credit: Paul Seed, Ken Riddington and BBC
results.brief_description: Ian Richardson is chilling in his portrayal of the now Prime Minister, Francis Urquhart. Determined to keep his power intact, Urquhart is challenged by the new King; a man with liberal ideals which set him on a collision course with the Prime Minister. Although Urquhart upholds the principles of the monarchy, he does not respect the man and therefore plans to topple him from his throne. Aided by a beautiful and cunning political assistant and egged on by his scheming wife, Urquhart is determined to remain the man pulling the strings.

results.title: To Paris with love
results.creator_credit: Robert Hamer, Antony Darnborough and Two Cities Films
results.brief_description: When a father decides that his son needs to be educated in learning about the fairer sex as well as life outside their blue blooded world, they head to the city which epitomises romance, Paris. Thus, Sir Edgar (Alec Guinness) and his 20 year old son begin a combined quest which appears completed when they meet the beautiful and spirited Lizette (Odile Versois). Complications arise when partner swapping appears on the cards. Sir Edgar finds himself falling in love with his son’s intended and his son too has fallen for the older woman (Elina Labourdette) he has found for his father. Cast also includes Vernon Gray.

results.title: To my dearest son Mileak
results.creator_credit: Natasha Craig, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Even though Natasha Craig was pregnant at age 15, she was determined to have her child and embrace her new life as a mother. With the support of her family, she has been able to do so and doesn’t regret her decision as she sets up her life for her and her son.

results.title: To my dearest beloved one - Shewitey Mearey
results.brief_description: A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop “Journeys with Breast Cancer” Created in association with Breast Cancer Network Australia. “I said to the doctor, I don’t care if I die tomorrow but I don’t want to leave my daughter alone. He said to me that first I had to live before I could have another child.”

results.title: To meet a challenge
results.brief_description: Aluminium is one of the most sought after metals in use today. All the stages in the manufacture of aluminium, from the mining of bauxite, the raw material, to the pressing of the metal into its final shape is depicted. As well as its mines in the Darling Ranges, Alcoa also owns refineries at places such as Kwinana and has ready access to ports to speed the finished product on its way, whether it be destined for Japan or the United States.
